document_data.mainbody:
Esvena Dyrr was a member of House Agrach Dyrr of Menzoberranzan until 1373 DR.
Esvena was the fourth daughter of matron mother Yasraena Dyrr.
For their betrayal of Menzoberranzan during the Siege of Menzoberranzan during the Silence of Lolth, her houses compound was besieged by House Xorlarrin and its allies. Esvena was present at the compounds bastions with her mother overseeing the situation. Yasraena discovered Gromph Baenres infiltration of their compound, but by then it was too late.
